title: How to care for the the environment everyday - Quora

response.answer_text: Each of us is an infinitesimal part of the Environment and can do nothing much to repay what we receive from it, each day. But the good news is, any small part that we play in conserving the Environment we live in has huge repercussions and leads the way for others to follow. You can start humbly by doing your bit in generating refuse as less as you can. Practice composting in your backyard, carry your own bags while shopping, encourage local shopkeepers to avoid giving polythene bags.Recycle clothes, practice sustainable fashion, stop buying unnecessarily and donate clothes that you wont need.Reduce consumption of meat.Use public transportation for majority of your travel or pool with friends and colleagues.These are some of the ways in which you could have a huge impact on the Environmental conservation movement.

Asking the question about how to care for the environment is a perfect start. Continue asking questions and never stop. Read up on articles in newspapers, academic journals, magazines, books and on the internet. #staywoke Remember that you have been indoctrinated to be wasteful by the Government, Media, greedy Corporations, everywhere you turn, but that you have a choice whether you want to continue to be. Educate yourself and share your knowledge. Each one teach one. Honor the Seventh Generation Iroquois story How to Honor the Seven Generations

Read to learn about what really affect our environment, preferentially from independent statistical sources. There is much false information around.Adapt your personal life-style to this information. You will not save the earth that way. Yet, knowledge have to be translated into some actions in order to affect anybody.Support political actions that build on your reading (1). E.g. support increase of taxes on carbon fuels (that is not what the French yellow vests do at present). Remember that the relevant time-frame is decades, not months or years.
